from node_device
order by ${orderByClause}

update node_device
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
mac = #{record.mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
on_time = #{record.onTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
off_time = #{record.offTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
